content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'vbrp' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE  TABLE dbo.vbrp
	(
	 [VBELN] int,
	 [NETWR] nvarchar(4000),
	 [FKIMG] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KOWRR] nvarchar(4000),
	 [VRKME] int,
	 [FKLMG] nvarchar(4000),
	 [VGBEL] int,
	 [AUBEL] int,
	 [MATNR] int,
	 [ARKTX] int,
	 [KONDM] int,
	 [VKGRP] int,
	 [WAVWR] int,
	 [ERDAT] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ERZET] nvarchar(4000),
	 [PRCTR] int,
	 [KZWI2] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KZWI3] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KZWI5] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KZWI6] nvarchar(4000),
	 [BWTAR] int,
	 [MEINS] int,
	 [MWSBP] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NTGEW] nvarchar(4000),
	 [POSNR] int,
	 [VGPOS] int,
	 [WERKS] int,
	 [GSBER] int,
	 [MATKL] int,
	 [PLTYP_AUFT] int,
	 [J_1BCFOP] int,
	 [SPART] int,
	 [BRGEW] nvarchar(4000),
	 [KVGR2] int,
	 [KVGR3] int
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_vbrp
--AS
--BEGIN
truncate table dbo.vbrp
COPY INTO dbo.vbrp
(VBELN 1, NETWR 2, FKIMG 3, KOWRR 4, VRKME 5, FKLMG 6, VGBEL 7, AUBEL 8, MATNR 9, ARKTX 10, KONDM 11, VKGRP 12, WAVWR 13, ERDAT 14, ERZET 15, PRCTR 16, KZWI2 17, KZWI3 18, KZWI5 19, KZWI6 20, BWTAR 21, MEINS 22, MWSBP 23, NTGEW 24, POSNR 25, VGPOS 26, WERKS 27, GSBER 28, MATKL 29, PLTYP_AUFT 30, J_1BCFOP 31, SPART 32, BRGEW 33, KVGR2 34, KVGR3 35)
FROM 'https://dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/3caracoes/VBRP/*.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT  top 10 *
 FROM dbo.vbrp
GO
